classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.description:
# FirebaseDataConverter

![VERSION](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/firebase-data-converter) ![PYTHON_VERSIONS](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/firebase-data-converter) ![STATUS](https://img.shields.io/pypi/status/firebase-data-converter)

To import data to **[Firebase Database](https://firebase.google.com/)**, data must be in json format. This is simple python tool to convert `xlsx` file (excel) to `json` and vice versa.

## Setup

```
pip install firebase-data-converter
```

## Usage

```
firebase-data-converter <action> -i <Input file> -o <Output file name>

positional arguments:
  action                  xlsx-to-json (Converts xlsx to json)
                          json-to-xlsx (Converts json to xlsx)

optional arguments:
  -i, --input             Input file (Required)
  -o, --output            Outptut file name (Required)
  -h, --help              show this help message and exit
  -v, --version           show program's version number and exit
```
  
## Examples
  
  1. To convert `xlsx` file to `json`
  
  ```
  firebase-data-converter xlsx-to-json -i data.xlsx -o firebase_data.json
  ```
  
  2. To convert `json` file to `xlsx`
  
  ```
  firebase-data-converter json-to-xlsx -i firebase_data.json -o data.xlsx
  ```
  
## File structure sample
  
**[firebase_data.json](https://github.com/ar-arvind/FirebaseDataConverter/blob/master/firebase_data.json)**

```json
{
  "1234": {
    "user_name": "Alice",
    "created_time": 1571832255,
    "admin": false,
    "published_posts": 5
  },
  "5678": {
    "user_name": "Bob",
    "created_time": 1571832408,
    "admin": true,
    "published_posts": 3
  }
}
```

**[data.xlsx](https://github.com/ar-arvind/FirebaseDataConverter/blob/master/data.xlsx)**

user_id | user_name |	created_time | admin | published_posts
------- | --------- | ------------ | ----- | ---------------
1234 | Alice |	1571832255 | FALSE | 5
5678 | Bob | 1571832408 | TRUE | 3

info.html_description:
FirebaseDataConverter

To import data to Firebase Database, data must be in json format. This is simple python tool to convert xlsx file (excel) to json and vice versa.

Setup

pip install firebase-data-converter

Usage

firebase-data-converter <action> -i <Input file> -o <Output file name>

positional arguments:
  action                  xlsx-to-json (Converts xlsx to json)
                          json-to-xlsx (Converts json to xlsx)

optional arguments:
  -i, --input             Input file (Required)
  -o, --output            Outptut file name (Required)
  -h, --help              show this help message and exit
  -v, --version           show program's version number and exit

Examples

  1. To convert xlsx file to json
firebase-data-converter xlsx-to-json -i data.xlsx -o firebase_data.json
  1. To convert json file to xlsx
firebase-data-converter json-to-xlsx -i firebase_data.json -o data.xlsx

File structure sample

firebase_data.json

{
  "1234": {
    "user_name": "Alice",
    "created_time": 1571832255,
    "admin": false,
    "published_posts": 5
  },
  "5678": {
    "user_name": "Bob",
    "created_time": 1571832408,
    "admin": true,
    "published_posts": 3
  }
}

data.xlsx

user_id user_name created_time admin published_posts
1234 Alice 1571832255 FALSE 5
5678 Bob 1571832408 TRUE 3
